Remarks: This is a widespread species found in all regions of the country from sea level to 2700 m altitude in various habitats. The flight season is from the beginning of May to the end of August. It is frequently recorded from Turkey (23 provinces, Fig. 16.1 ).

Distribution: Countries bordering the Mediterranean Sea and the Black Sea, from Portugal to Iran.
New for Turkey
.
